title: Russian Federation Council approves using country's armed forces abroad
content:
Baku, Azerbaijan, Sept.30 
 
Trend: 
 
The Federation Council of Russia has approved using the country’s armed forces abroad, RIA Novosti reported. 
 
Earlier, Russian President Vladimir Putin requested the Federation Council to authorize sending Russian troops abroad. 

Story still developing
